formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes: Update
description:
An update for The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes is now available from
Nintendo eShop.

This will update the software to
Version 2.1.0 with the following
amendments:

・ The update adds "hero points", a
new element designed to help
you fully complete the game.

・ Various bugs have been fixed in
order to provide a smoother gaming
experience.

・ Introduces additional enhancements
to improve the user’s experience and
enjoyment.

- You will need to install Ver. 2.1.0
to play online.

We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes: Update
